title: What's Wrong With Secretary Kim
synopsis: A narcissistic CEO begins to reflect on his life when his highly capable secretary decides to resign.

title: Business Proposal
synopsis: A blind date goes wrong when an employee discovers her date is actually her company’s CEO.

title: Touch Your Heart
synopsis: A famous actress works at a law firm to prepare for a role and develops feelings for a stoic lawyer.

title: Jugglers
synopsis: A cold-hearted boss and his hardworking secretary slowly develop a romantic relationship.

title: My Secret Romance
synopsis: A chaebol heir reunites years later with the woman he had a one-night encounter with.

title: She Was Pretty
synopsis: Two childhood friends reunite at work, but their lives have changed drastically.

title: Her Private Life
synopsis: A museum curator hides her fangirl identity while falling for her new director.

title: Forecasting Love and Weather
synopsis: Employees at a weather agency navigate complicated professional and romantic relationships.

title: The Secret Life of My Secretary
synopsis: A secretary becomes the only person a face-blind CEO can recognize.

title: Strong Woman Do Bong Soon
synopsis: A woman with superhuman strength is hired as a CEO’s bodyguard.

title: King the Land
synopsis: An heir to a luxury hotel empire clashes with a cheerful employee.

title: Start-Up
synopsis: Young entrepreneurs chase success and love in South Korea’s startup scene.

title: My ID Is Gangnam Beauty
synopsis: A college student navigates life and love after undergoing plastic surgery.

title: Romance Is a Bonus Book
synopsis: A struggling writer finds a fresh start at a publishing company.

title: Suspicious Partner
synopsis: A prosecutor and a trainee get entangled in both romance and crime.

title: Search WWW
synopsis: Women executives at major search companies balance ambition and relationships.

title: My Shy Boss
synopsis: An extremely introverted CEO clashes with an outspoken new employee.

title: Encounter
synopsis: A chance meeting abroad leads to a complicated romance back in Korea.

title: Because This Is My First Life
synopsis: Two adults enter a contract marriage while navigating societal expectations.

title: Clean with Passion for Now
synopsis: A germaphobic CEO falls for a carefree cleaning employee.
